backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as backend placeholder.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing implemented romantic UI features and their associated frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for multiple frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind config with color variables and dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling client-side routing between three pages.
frontend/src/components/FloatingDecor.ts: Generates animated floating heart and star emoji elements.
frontend/src/components/RomanticButton.t: Styled reusable button component with romantic theme variants.
frontend/src/components/TwinklingStars.t: Renders randomized animated star sprites for visual effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on user identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles, romantic theme variables, fonts, and component-level utilities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/DefinitelyPage.tsx: Displays the 'definitely' page with star effects, a back button, an illustrated image, and a cherry-pink caption.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the landing page with floating decor, a prompt message, and navigation buttons to the yass and definitely pages.
frontend/src/pages/YassPage.tsx: Shows the 'yass' page with a back button, kiss-stamp graphic, and a styled multi-line romantic message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, image needs, and current implementation state for the romantic multi-page site.
